Result.Message: "1. Provide the name and contact information of the staff person responsible for the website." is required.
"2. Describe how the state provides personnel with the technical expertise to maintain the Website:" is required.
"3. Describe how the website will be maintained and updated after the term of LSC grant:" is required.
"4. Describe how you plan to sustain both the website and the staff to manage content of the site after the end of the grant:" is required.
"5. Describe how the website impacts the client community and how you plan to make it accessible:" is required.
"6. Describe how the website helps clients with limited literacy or limited English proficiency:" is required.
